hero.h1: Learn and apply AI to your job. No fluff.
hero.sub: Pick a job task. We’ll guide three decisive moves, validate, and you’re done.
note.incognito: Incognito by default. Nothing saved unless you say so.
intake.placeholder: Describe your job or task (e.g., ‘weekly pipeline update’, ‘60-sec script’).
validator.title: No‑fluff check
